bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of qi rising with rapid panting brought about by an overabundance of heat in the lung. You ke fa hui 幼科發揮 2: 馬脾風者，肺脹也，上氣喘急，兩脅扇動，鼻張悶亂， 喘喝聲嗄，痰涎壅塞，其證危惡 , “ Horse-spleen wind is a dilatation of the lung. [Patients suffer from] rising qi and rapid panting. Both flanks make a flapping movement. The nose is dilated accompanied by heart-pressure and a feeling of disorder. [Patients] pant with much noise; their voice is exclamatory. A dangerous condition”.
